QuestData.Title: Myzrael's Tale
QuestData.Description: As the stone goes quiet, you're left with a vague sense of unease. Something isn't right.$B$BPerhaps you should tell Skuerto of what you've done so far.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Skuerto at Refuge Pointe in Arathi Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Say no more, $n. I followed up with an... "old friend" while you were gone. I should've known better than to send you to those shards.$B$BWe've both made a grave mistake in involving ourselves in this. Luckily, I "persuaded" my boy Gerrig to tell me what to do if this happened.
